name: Under Duh Sea
description:
In this game, you must survive the predators of the deep ocean in order to become one. Currently, they're harmless.

Controls:

Mouse for movement

Shift to use speed boost

R to reincarnate as a higher tier creature once your gauge is full

Created this game for LuxJam!

Work in progress... (plan to add multiplayer and AI that chases you and flees from you)
